doc.title: Plugins
doc.desc: Plugins class is a class that manages plugins. Objects cannot be created from this class.

member.name: link
member.desc: Connect the specified plug-in to Kirikiri body (read).

member.name: unlink

argitem.name: name
argitem.desc: Specify the plug-in to be detached.

member.result: True if successful, false if unsuccessful
member.desc: Detach the specified plug-in. Some plug-ins do not respond to release (for example, when an object is in use). It does not respond to release and returns false if it fails.

member.name: getList
member.result: Array containing the names of the linked plugins
member.desc: Get a list of plugins. The returned array is a list of plugin names in the order in which they were linked.
